name: softelevision
description:
"part pop art, part music mixtape, part virtual photomontage of a landscape painting" - sufficiently human

SOFTELEVISION

a small game and mixtape by James Shasha

with music by:
Otis Redding, Fleet Foxes, Mogwai, Plume Giant, Thrupence, and Spoon

and art by Brook Chipman and Mel Stangel

CONTROLS

WASD & mouse

Controller works too & is more relaxing

use the spacebar or 'A' button to get in and out of the raft

pretty much you can just sail around and chill and melt some yucky ads if you want.

enjoy~~~~~

<3

-Shasha

@videoJames_

MORE FREE GAMES AT http://sundaemonth.com/ <3

PS
apologies for the wonky platforming and camera. your character just snaps to the height of any surface directly under you. The camera will snap to avoid clipping through things and that can be a little jarring if you're not expecting it.
